question: Can you please verify that I am speaking to [patient name] and that you reside at [address and Zip]?
Patients with Rheumatoid arthritis typically take multiple medications to help them at their best. Are you taking any other medications on a routine basis?
Would you please share how many medications you are currently taking? Please pick one of the following
Are you having any difficulties taking your medication as prescribed?
Which of the following best describes the difficulties that you are having? Please say yes to any that apply to you.Have you had difficulties remembering to take your medications?
Have you had difficulties understanding the directions for taking your medications?
Have you had difficulties affording your medications?
We would be happy to set up refill reminders for your medication. We can provide refill reminders by phone or by text. How would you prefer to be notified?
May I verify that we have the correct phone number for your notification? I have (903)-429-6224 Extension: 903 as your phone number. Is that correct?
Would you like us to do that for you?
Would you like for me to send you this information?
If yes, can I please validate your address and I will send it to you today.
